name: The 95-Pound Mole
description: A captain makes a disrespectful joke about a New York underboss's wife.
context: Ralph Cifaretto made a crude joke about Ginny Sack, the wife of New York underboss Johnny Sack. The joke spread. Johnny is humiliated and furious. He's demanding you sanction a hit on Ralph. Ralph is a made man and your top earner, bringing in significant money from construction. Johnny is a powerful figure in the Lupertazzi family and a longtime ally.
prompt: Johnny Sack wants Ralph dead over a joke about his wife. Ralph is your best earner. What do you do?
stakes: If you give up Ralph, you lose your top earner and kill a made man over words. If you refuse, Johnny feels disrespected.
